description:
Koyuki sees a movie that convinces her true friendship is born in competition.  So she challenges Natsumi to a tennis match... where the loser has to wear an afro hairstyle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les princesses de la terre battue / En Mai, fais ce qu`il te plait
夏美 & 小雪 テニスのプリンセス であります / ケロロ 侵略日和のさつき晴れ であります
